title: Inhibition of apoptosis and biofilm formation in Candida auris by click-synthesized triazole-bridged quinoline derivatives
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21190-21202
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03728F, Paper

Mohmmad Younus Wani, Vartika Srivastava, Waleed Ahmed El-Said, Abdullah Saad Al-Bogami, Aijaz Ahmad
Candida auris, a recent addition to the Candida species, poses a significant threat with its association to numerous hospital outbreaks globally, particularly affecting immunocompromised individuals.
